long_description: Protecting your gear wherever you roam, this rugged Thule Pulse XL roof box is ideal for year-round use on car-top racks! Large capacity swallows skis (6 - 8 pairs), poles, snowboards (4 - 6) and paddles with ease, and frees up all kinds of trunk space no matter what you're heading out to do. Rugged construction with impact-resistant ABS plastic. Passenger-side opening provides easy access for loading and unloading. Can be mounted on square and round crossbars and most factory racks (see Fit List). Easy-grip mounting assembles quickly and easily attaches to car rack. Thule Pulse XL roof box has a SecureLock feature that ensures cargo box is closed securely.
short_description: Protecting your gear wherever you roam, this rugged Thule Pulse XL roof box is ideal for year-round use on car-top racks!
